title: War Of The Roses Update: She Wanted Proof Her Sister’s Fiancé Isn’t The Man He Says He Is
description:
Remember our listener who hated the guy her sister was marrying and wanted our help to try and catch him cheating online? Ultimately her plan backfired when we found out that he was listening the whole time, and told the sister to mind her own business.
So did she ever talk to her sister about the situation? Did her sister ever marry the guy? We have an update!  
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
